ComicInfo.Summary:
MAD goes way out of bounds with its Super Bowl coverage, outs The Simpsons and sizes up Two and a Half Men. MAD also digs up unfortunate outtakes from Lemony Snicket and lines cut from George W. Bush's inauguration speech. Plus, a Spy vs. Spy 2005 calendar!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-12-11 23:26:41. [Issue ID 130317]
